x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.enabled) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.enabled))
!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.sql) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.sql))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.sqlVersion) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.sqlVersion))
